707125f-a.text:
Union Avenue, east side, north from South 3rd, to Stagg Streets. No. 70 is the first frame house at the right; the low square building is P.S. No. 191; the 3-story structure on the left being the Department of Sanitation
Unit.No. 118.
August 26, 1935.
P. L. Sperr.
707125f-a.folder: Union Ave. & 3rd St. S., Brooklyn, NY

707121f-b.text:
1. 72-74 Union Ave., at and adjoining the N.E. corner of Scholes Street, as seen from South 3rd Street (shadowed). At the corner ts the Synagddde.

August 26, 1935.
P. L. Sperr.
